document_data.name: Derlaunt
document_data.mainbody: '''Derlaunt''' was the ruler of [[Gheldaneth]] in [[Mulhorand]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Being bored, Derlaunt was trying to animate one of the many [[Statues-That-Walk]] surrounding Gheldaneth. However the ritual he had cast backfired and instead animated all the statues and Derlaunt needed to fix the problem.
document_data.History: Derlaunt fought all his life to obtain the power he desired but obtained it only when he was too old to enjoy it.
document_data.Personality: Derlaunt was a very irritable old individual. He considered himself above all people save a few Mulhorandi nobles.
document_data.Relationship: Derlaunt was the cousin of [[Tholaunt]], the current incarnation of [[Thoth]].
